sentences.en: “What is that?” he screamed as his flashlight lit the darkest and dampest corner of the basement.
sentences.cn: “什么东西？” 当他的手电筒照到地下室最黑暗、最潮湿的角落时，他尖叫起来。

sentences.en: A flashlight beam probed the underbrush only yards away from their hiding place.
sentences.cn: 一束手电筒的光束在离他们的藏身之地只有几码远的灌木丛里搜寻着。

sentences.en: He took a flashlight lest It'should get dark before he returned.
sentences.cn: 为了预防回来以前天就黑了,所以他带着手电筒.

sentences.en: He took a pencil flashlight out of his pocket.
sentences.cn: 他从口袋中掏出一支笔形电筒.

sentences.en: He was busy shining a small pencil flashlight into Michael's eyes.
sentences.cn: 他用一支小得像铅笔一样的电筒照了照迈克尔的眼睛.

sentences.en: His flashlight was still clipped to his belt.
sentences.cn: 他的手电筒还别在皮带上。

sentences.en: Hung - chien called out hurriedly, " I have a small flashlight. "
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 忙叫: “ 我有个小手电. ”

sentences.en: I could see the beam of his flashlight waving around in the dark.
sentences.cn: 我可以看到他的手电筒光在黑暗中上下舞动.

sentences.en: I saw the sudden flare of a flashlight in the darkness.
sentences.cn: 我看到手电筒在黑暗中突然闪出的亮光.

sentences.en: Len studied it a moment in the beam of his flashlight.
sentences.cn: 莱恩借着手电筒的光亮把它仔细研究了一会儿。

sentences.en: Sam was flicking a flashlight on and off.
sentences.cn: 萨姆啪啪不停地把手电筒开了又关。

sentences.en: She froze when the beam of the flashlight struck her.
sentences.cn: 当手电筒的光照到她身上时她僵住了。
把手电筒往这儿照一照.

sentences.en: The inspector was shining a flashlight onto the tickets.
sentences.cn: 查票员打着手电筒查看车票.

sentences.en: The man walked slowly towards her, shining the flashlight.
sentences.cn: 那名男子打着手电筒，慢慢地朝她走过去。

sentences.en: The photographer used his flashlight to take pictures of the graduation.
sentences.cn: 摄影师用闪光灯照毕业相.
威奇向约翰的手电筒瞥了一眼。

words.tran_cn: 闪光的；瞬间的；俗丽的；暴躁的
发出闪光之物；闪光装置

trans.tran_en: a small electric light that you can carry in your hand
